name: Mr Anchry's Divine Intervention
description:
Game created for the 109th Weekly Game Jam where the theme was "Sad Ending" this is also the 4th installment in the Mr. Anchry Universe. 

A first person story-driven psychological horror game where you can never be truly sure if you are playing the game or if the game is playing you. 

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look/Rotate

E - Interact

ESC - Menu
